ygData.subject: Re: How to learn a language
ygData.msgSnippet: Tom, how do you improve a language without learning from someone who is excellent? In other words, how would two average speakers of Old Erudian work their
ygData.messageBody:
Tom, how do you improve a language without learning from someone who is
excellent? In other words, how would two average speakers of Old Erudian
work their language skill up? Someone told me that we should group, spam
each other, get two improves, then zone. Then repeat until you faint. Is
this correct?

----- Original Message -----
From: Tom Matthews <tmatthews@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 2:02 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Kobold vs Elder Tier'Dal


> From: Tom Matthews <tmatthews@...>
>
> I
speak all race languages plus, Elder Elvish, Old Erudian, Elder Teir'dal,
and Combine, all to excellent.
